EmailTemplate.description: StarTrack MyNetwork - Used to notify the network that the case investigation milestone has been violated.
EmailTemplate.name: StarTrack MyNetwork Network Escalation Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Unanswered: {!CaseInvestigation__c.CaseType__c} - {!CaseInvestigation__c.NetworkName__c} - Case: {!CaseInvestigation__c.CaseNumber__c} - {!CaseInvestigation__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Australia Post
You are listed as a point of escalation for {!CaseInvestigation__c.NetworkName__c}
Case {!CaseInvestigation__c.CaseNumber__c} - {!CaseInvestigation__c.Name} has not received a final resolution from the team at {!CaseInvestigation__c.NetworkName__c} and the customer is waiting on a response.
Can you please
update the Customer Contact Centre (CCC) by either replying to this email or responding through MyNetwork, or Forward to appropriate staff at {!CaseInvestigation__c.NetworkName__c}, so they respond to the CCC via this email or MyNetwork.
No longer the contact?
If you are no longer the appropriate contact for {!CaseInvestigation__c.NetworkName__c} please email MyNetworkSupport@auspost.com.au with the correct contact's details so we can update our records.
MyNetwork access
Access requests can be made via MyIT
MyNetwork support
MyNetwork FAQs The MyNetwork Information Guide is accessible within MyNetwork via the ‘Support’ tab, or via the Knowledge Base in POP. For technical issues, please contact MyNetworkSupport@auspost.com.au or log a MyIT ticket under ‘Applications and Software’ & ‘Salesforce’ For deliveries last mile support, please contact DeliveriesMyNetworkSupport@auspost.com.au
Thank you.
